Description: Pottery ostracon with part of an incised inscription - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394038) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394038)
